00021 #ifndef _QUANTDATATRANSFORM_H_
00022 #define _QUANTDATATRANSFORM_H_
00023 
00024 //
00025 #include "chipstream/DataStore.h"
00026 #include "chipstream/ChipStream.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/DataTransform.h"
00028 #include "chipstream/SketchQuantNormTran.h"
00029 #include "util/Util.h"
00030 //
00031 
00032 class QuantDataTransform {
00033   
00034 public:
00035 
00036 
00037   QuantDataTransform(QuantMethodFactory::QuantType type, PsBoard &board, 
00038                      std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> &reporters,
00039                      const std::string &pmSpec, 
00040                      const std::string &qSpec,
00041                      const std::string &spfFile) {
00042     PmAdjusterFactory pmFactory;
00043     QuantMethodFactory qmFactory(type);
00044     m_QuantMethod = qmFactory.quantMethodForString(qSpec, board, type);
00045     m_PmAdjuster = pmFactory.pmAdjusterForString(pmSpec, board);
00046     m_Reporters = reporters;
00047     m_SpfFile = spfFile;
00048   }
00049 
00050   ~QuantDataTransform() {
00051     Freez(m_PmAdjuster);
00052     Freez(m_QuantMethod);
00053   }
00054 
00055   void setReporters(std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> &reporters) {
00056     m_Reporters = reporters;
00057   }
00058 
00059   QuantMethod *getQuantMethod() {
00060     return m_QuantMethod;
00061   }
00062 
00063   bool doAnalysis(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00064                   IntensityMart &iMart,
00065                   bool doReport) {
00066     bool success = true;
00067     vector<ChipStream *> streams; // all the normalization should be done so we're using empty
00068     if(m_QuantMethod->setUp(psGroup, iMart, streams, *m_PmAdjuster)) {
00069       m_QuantMethod->computeEstimate();
00070       if(doReport) {
00071         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00072           m_Reporters[i]->report(psGroup, *m_QuantMethod, iMart, streams, *m_PmAdjuster);
00073         }
00074       }
00075     }
00076     else {
00077       Verbose::out(5, "Warning setup failed for name: " + ToStr(psGroup.name));
00078       success = false;
00079     }
00080     if(!success && doReport) {
00081       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00082         m_Reporters[i]->reportFailure(psGroup, *m_QuantMethod, iMart, streams, *m_PmAdjuster);
00083       }
00084     }
00085     return success;
00086   }
00087   
00088   void transformData(PsBoard &board, DataStore &in, DataStore &out) {
00089       SpfReader spfReader;
00090       spfReader.openSpf(m_SpfFile);
00091       
00092       int numPsSets = 0;
00093       board.get("num-probesets", &numPsSets);
00094       unsigned int dotMod = max(numPsSets/20, 1);
00095       Verbose::progressBegin(1, ToStr("Processing Probesets"), 20, (int)dotMod, numPsSets);
00096       ProbeSet *ps = spfReader.readNextProbeSet();
00097       while(ps != NULL) {
00098         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00099         ProbeSetGroup psGroup(ps); 
00100         doAnalysis(psGroup, in, true);
00101         // psGroup should delete the memory for ps...
00102         ps = spfReader.readNextProbeSet();
00103       }
00104       Verbose::progressEnd(1, ToStr("Done."));
00105   }
00106 
00107 private:
00108   std::string m_SpfFile;
00109   PmAdjuster *m_PmAdjuster;
00110   QuantMethod *m_QuantMethod;
00111   std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> m_Reporters;
00112 
00113 };
00114 
00115 #endif  /* _QUANTDATATRANSFORM_H_ */
